Title: Relates to payments under contracts for transportation of school children
Summary: Requires school districts to continue to make payments of benefits, compensation and emoluments pursuant to the terms of any contract for transportation of school children that were in effect as of the date of any school closure which is due to a declared emergency as if the services had been provided.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to payment under contracts for transportation services during a declared state of emergency
